Words v. Facts

Sep 4, 2004

For four years George W. Bush has used the power of words to overcome insurmountable facts.

A hilarious, must-see video clip from the Daily Show, claiming to be George W. Bush’s reelection spot. (There is also this version of the clip, but it breaks up at the end on my computer.)

(via BoingBoing and Elementropy)
